title: Pig Pen Improving Conditions for the Feeder Pigs

tasks.task: Apply mulch to prevent muddy conditions for feeder pigs.
subtasks: Assess the depth of the existing mud.
Calculate the amount of mulch needed (13 bags).
Distribute mulch evenly around the feeder pigs' area.
Verify the effectiveness of the mulch in improving standing conditions.

tasks.task: Monitor pig reaction to the new footing.
subtasks: Confirm pigs are using the area more easily.

tasks.task: Ensure farm operations benefit from improved animal comfort.
subtasks: Evaluate the overall impact of reduced mud on pig feeding.
Adjust future feeding practices if necessary.
